data.text:
2023-24 Men's Basketball Roster

Choose a Player:

Mitchell Leff/Atlantic 10

3 Anwar Gill

Position G

Class Senior

Height 6-4

Weight 205

Hometown Washington, D.C.

High School Gonzaga High School

Bio

Stats

Historical

Biography

HONORS AND AWARDS

Atlantic 10 Commissioner's Honor Roll (2022-23, 2020-21)

2023-24 (Senior)

Played in 29 games, starting 15

Ranked fourth on the team in scoring, averaging 9.3 points per game

Scored 15 points in back-to-back games to begin the season, also added a career-high seven assists in win over Northeastern (11/11)

Impressed at #9 Duke with 17 points (11/21)

Scored 21 points and grabbed a career-high nine rebounds in win over Coppin State (11/26)

Reached double-figures in wins over Penn (12/2) and Loyola MD (12/6), passed for seven assists vs Penn

Added 15 points vs hometown school Howard (12/30)

Recorded a season-high 24 points vs Saint Louis (2/7), double-figures for the first time in over a month

Passed for six assists in win over Rhode Island (2/25)

Scored 15 points on his senior day win over George Washington (3/2)

Went a perfect 5/5 from the field in his final game at La Salle vs St. Bonaventure (3/13)

2022-23 (Junior)

Played in 30 games with four starts, averaging 7.9 points per game and 3.3 assists per game

Finished ranked 25th in the A-10 in field goal percentage (.446)

Netted a career-high 26 points in the team's 84-81 overtime win over Penn (12/3)...shot 9-for-15 from the field, including 3-for-5 from three-point range, and 5-for-7 from the free throw line in 35 minutes..set career highs in field goals made, three-pointers made, foul shots made, and field goals attempted.

Pulled down a career-high eight rebounds while playing a career-high 45 minutes against Drexel (12/10)

Handed out a season-high eight assists in team's 82-72 win over Bucknell (12/6)

2021-22 (Sophomore)

Made 28 appearances and 12 starts for the Explorers, averaging 4.4 points and 2.9 assists per game, leading the team with 1.2 steals per contest

Had eight games with five or more assists

Opened his season with 10 points, five rebounds, five assists and five steals against Sacred Heart

Scored seven points while adding a career-best nine assists against FDU, pitching in five rebounds

Scored a season-best 12 points while dishing seven dimes against Penn

Scored double-digits against St. Bonaventure while dropping seven assists against the Bonnies

2020-21 (Freshman)

Promising freshman season that saw him play in 22 contests, including four starts

Missed first two games of season due to injury

Had team-high 15 points in win over Drexel

Also grabbed season-high eight rebounds against the Dragons

Had six points and season-high five assists in win over Delaware

Matched that 15-point total in win over Saint Joseph's

Had 14 points on 7-for-14 shooting against UMass

Background

Spent prep season at Montverde Academy in Florida

Led team to 24-7 record

Prior to season at Montverde, graduated from traditional power Gonzaga College High School in Washington, D.C

Scored 19 points to lead the Eagles to a Washington Catholic Athletic Conference title in 2019

The championship was the third for Gonzaga in five seasons

Named All-District of Columbia Second Team by USA Today, averaging 11.5 points, 5.8 rebounds and 2.9 assists per game

Tallied 18 points and eight rebounds in a 76-70 win over Our Savior New American at the Slam Dunk at the Beach event in Lewes, Del

On the AAU circuit, averaged 18 points, six rebounds, and three assists per game for DC Premier, which ranked as one of the top five teams in the nation according to 247sports.com

Converted over 58 percent of his field goal attempts

Named to First Team All-Southern Jam Fest

Season Statistics
